name: 劉秋蘭
objective:
「生活美學」是文化生活發展的重要內核，也是文化產業化、產業文化化過程中必要關涉的範疇與議題，本課程旨在探索東西方文活的重要元素，從生活物質層面到精神層面，從文化生活的重要元素及其呈現模式，取材雅富美感的行為文化，進而尋覓發展成為體驗經濟模式的途徑，達到由文化復育到文化設計的目的。「生活美學」是現代人據各家美學定義所推論出的新名詞，專應用於生活；「文化設計」乃取用生活美學諸元素，作人際禮儀的規劃設計。透過提煉、體驗設計與推廣，實現傳承古風、用古於今、達到充實且深刻的現代生活美學追求。
      課程的規劃結合三個面向，將人際互動創意需求、傳統與當代文化元素共融案例探討、東西方植物飲文化所帶來的生活形式美感五覺，作實驗性文化美學設計。期擬提供人情交流重整的精緻平台，並可望成為一項跨域連結新創產業的前導。
Life Aesthetics is the kernel of cultural life; it has become integral in the process toward cultural industrialization and industrial culturalization. Life aesthetics is not only inscribed in our cultural experiences, but also affiliated with the "creative life," 
This course will examine the important elements constituting cultural lives across different dynasties in Chinese history and investigate their patterns of presentations. By integrating old with new, tradition with modernity, cultural heritage with contemporary practices, students are empowered in their imagination and creativity in cultural designs, This course comprises three stages. the focus is primarily on the ideas of heaven and mankind and their correlativity, including concepts of solar terms and rhythm of life, permanence and non-permanence, patriarchal clan system and people's beliefs and ethics. The course ends with presentations of students' application projects.
